username_min_length: Username must be at least 3 characters.
simple_form_title: Simple Form with React Hook Form
simple_form_description: Demonstrates form handling and validation using React Hook Form and Zod.
avatar_description: Displays an image representation of a user or entity.
badge_description: Displays a small piece of information.
button_description: Displays a button or a link.
card_description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.
dialog_description: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window.
label_description: Renders an accessible label associated with controls.
popover_description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.
select_description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from.
tabs_description: A set of layered sections of content, known as tab panels, that are displayed one at a time.
textarea_description: Displays a multi-line text input field.
login_description: Enter your email below to login to your account.
password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters.
login_failed_generic: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
